Author: pldgr.org
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] PLDGR.ORG: Verifiable, Traceable, Social Media Donation Platfrom
Body: hi @anggriani  We are in the process of signing up a number of nonprofits to utilize our platform. At this point, we won't be allowing anyone to raise funds as we have a stringent verification process. Once approved, they will have access to a series of tools that will enable them to run campaigns and leverage our platform's capabilities. These capabilities includes social media integration using our hashtag/trend monitoring, real-time donation tracking using blockchain, and fundraising events promotion within our site.  We will be launching our first fundraising event for GWAVE this week so everyone can see how we plan to help the nonprofit community through our platform.

Author: pldgr.org
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] PLDGR.ORG: Verifiable, Traceable, Social Media Donation Platfrom

Author: pldgr.org
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] PLDGR.ORG: Verifiable, Traceable, Social Media Donation Platfrom
Body: ANNOUNCEMENT: TOKEN SALE IS ON HOLD INDEFINITELY   WEBSITE | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | REDDIT | FACEBOOK | MEDIUM      The Future of Online Donation  PLDGR, pronounced as /pledger/, is commited in helping those who help others. By combining the traceability and efficiency of Blockchain, and leveraging the network effects of Social Media, we aim to significantly improve, yet simplify the process of online charitable giving.  | READ OUR WHITEPAPER |   Online Charitable Giving Today  The industry is clearly in need of a major upgrade. People who are interested in donating to help global disasters or simply to reach out to those in need often find the traditional process of online donation tedious and unappealing. With the surge of online content every minute, people often get confused on which charity or cause to donate to; and even when they finally decide, they find it difficult to do so.   Primary Features of PLDGR Platform  Social Media Integration. PLDGR platform will enable Non-Profit Organizations to fully utilize their Social Media channels in spreading awareness about charity events, and identifying potential donors. This is done through a proprietary Hashtag and Trend Monitoring System that will be implemented in the platform.  Traceability & Accountability. Built on the Ethereum blockchain, the PLDGR platform helps social organisations to run projects transparently, using a Distributed Ledger and Smart Contracts to ensure their impact is independently verified and accessible to everyone.  360Â° Feedback Mechanism The PLDGR platform ensures that all donated funds are successfully distributed and allocated to the intended recipients. Aside from utilizing our ERC20 token, DN8, to track fund movements, the platform will also require Non-Profit Organizations to submit multimedia reports before 100% withdrawal of the donated funds is allowed.   Token Sale  PLDGR.orgâ€™s DN8 token is an ERC20 token created to perform all transactions within the platform. A maximum of 450,000,000 tokens will be created and distributed.   Join Our Airdrop [Airdrop] ðŸ’š Get $15 worth of DN8 tokens for Phase 1 ðŸ’š   | Visit Our Website. |

As for the amount and the item has gone, I think everyone can understand...

Author: James (PLDGR Support)
Title: [ANN][PRESALE] PLDGR.ORG: Verifiable, Traceable, Social Media Donation Platfrom
Body: Hi there!  That is one of the areas PLDGR will address. The assurance to donors that their contribution were really used for their selected charity.  The final flow of the platform is, once the minimum amount of donation for a certain project is achieved, PLDGR will provide the option to convert the funds to fiat currency and turn it over to the charitable institution or convert the donation to any of the popular cryptocurrencies. The institution will then be required to provide documentation of how the funds were used in the project. A certain percentage of the donated funds will be kept until the institution is able to provide their project report. If the minimum amount is not reached, the donated tokens will automatically revert back to the donors. This would be helpful so as not to produce fundraising campaigns that do not hit the target which will only create incomplete projects.   Being able to see the status of a certain project would also bolster donorsâ€™ motivation to take further action and complete the project.   For more about this, please view our whitepaper in our website: https://www.pldgr.org
